LanguageData.LingLongRandPowerGiverPowerUpDesc: The converted power is increased by 100Wd
LanguageData.LingLongRandPowerGiverPowerDownDesc: The converted power is reduced by 100Wd
LanguageData.FindNeederLabelDesc: Re-acquire available receivers, only the current map
LanguageData.UseNextNeederDesc: Select the next available receiver from the currently acquired receiver list, the connected receiver will be skipped
LanguageData.CutLinkDesc: Cut off the currently connected transmitter
